title.message: Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template

short_description.message: Extend Outbound Funds Module with a portal for fundseekers.

description.message:
Welcome to the Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template installer!

Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template streamlines the funding process and helps fund providers cultivate and manage relationships with their fundees. Leveraging Salesforce Experience Cloud, Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template makes funding a breeze through an intuitive, easy-to-use interface and backend automation.

*IMPORTANT*: Salesforce does not recommend installing upgrades directly in production organizations. Instead, install Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template in one of your free sandbox environments or a developer organization first.

Once you've installed it, check out resources on getting started in our documentation:

* [Outbound Funds Module Documentation](https://powerofus.force.com/s/article/OFM-Documentation)

Questions? Become a member of the [Outbound Funds Module](https://powerofus.force.com/s/group/0F980000000CvlMCAS) community group in the Power of Us Hub.

error_message.message: To get help with this error, go to [help.salesforce.com](https://help.salesforce.com/), find the Support & Services area and log a technical support ticket with Salesforce. Include “Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template” in the subject line and include in your comment the installation link shown here.

title.message: Install Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template

preflight_message.message: This will install the Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template into your org. The installer adds the Fundseeker Starter Experience Site template to your org.

post_install_message.message: Thanks for installing Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template. Please visit the [Outbound Funds Module Site](https://powerofus.force.com/s/group/0F980000000CvlMCAS) community group on the Power of Us Hub for any questions about Outbound Funds Module or Outbound Funds Site.

error_message.message: To get help with this error, go to [help.salesforce.com](https://help.salesforce.com/), find the Support & Services area and log a technical support ticket with Salesforce. Include “Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template” in the subject line and include in your comment the installation link shown here.

Please enable My Domain in your org prio.message: Please enable My Domain in your org prior to installing.

The Fundseeker Starter Portal Template r.message: The Fundseeker Starter Portal Template requires Customer Community Plus Login licenses. Please coordinate with your Salesforce account executive to be sure you have the correct licenses set up in your org.
The Fundseeker Starter Portal Template requires that Digital Experiences is enabled. Make sure to enable it in your org before installing the site template.

Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter.message: Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template requires Chatter. Please enable Chatter in your org and try again.

The Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Sta.message: The Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template requires Outbound Funds Module to be installed. Please visit the [Outbound Funds Module repo](https://github.com/SalesforceFoundation/OutboundFundsModule).

An Experience site with the default 'Fun.message: An Experience site with the default 'Fundseeker Portal' name already exists.

Deploy Create Application Flow And Quick.message: Deploy Create Application Flow And Quick Action

Deploy Submit Application Flow And Quick.message: Deploy Submit Application Flow And Quick Action

Deploy Submit Requirement Flow And Quick.message: Deploy Submit Requirement Flow And Quick Action

Add 'Apply' Button on the Funding Progra.message: Add 'Apply' Button on the Funding Program Layout

Add 'Submit Application' Button on the F.message: Add 'Submit Application' Button on the Funding Request Layout

Add 'Add File' Button on the Requirement.message: Add 'Add File' Button on the Requirement Layout

Add 'Fundseeker Plus Login' Profile to F.message: Add 'Fundseeker Plus Login' Profile to Fundseeker Portal

title.message: Install Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template and Build Experience Site

preflight_message.message: This will install Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template into your org. The installer will also create a Site from the Fundseeker Starter Portal Template and applies our recommended configurations.

post_install_message.message: Thanks for installing Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template. Please visit the [Outbound Funds Module Fundseeker Starter Portal Template](https://powerofus.force.com/s/group/0F980000000CvlMCAS) community group on the Power of Us Hub for any questions about Outbound Funds Module or Outbound Funds Site.

error_message.message: To get help with this error, go to [help.salesforce.com](https://help.salesforce.com/), find the Support & Services area and log a technical support ticket with Salesforce. Include “Outbound Funds Module” in the subject line and include in your comment the installation link shown here.
